snippet.title: Intel tried to keep this from me
snippet.description:
Play Crossout for FREE on PC, Xbox Series X|S and PS¬Æ5: https://www.crossout.net/download.  See you in battle!

Purchase the Viewsonic X2000-4K at https://geni.us/7vBAO

We almost didn‚Äôt attend SIGGRAPH, but we had to go when Intel revealed Arc Pro GPUs. Is it everything graphics professionals hoped it would be, and if not, what did Nvidia announce?

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1449242-intel-tried-to-keep-this-from-me/

Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

‚ñ∫ GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
‚ñ∫ SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE: https://www.floatplane.com/ltt
‚ñ∫ AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS: https://lmg.gg/sponsors
‚ñ∫ PODCAST GEAR: https://lmg.gg/podcastgear

Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0 https://geni.us/mj6pHk4
Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0 https://geni.us/Ps3XfE

CHAPTERS
---------------------------------------------------
0:00 Intro
0:54 Arc Pro A40 demos
1:57 Arc Pro A40 & A50 specs
3:05 Arctic Sound-M datacenter GPUs (SuperMicro)
4:23 No Nvidia on the show floor
5:17 Webcam-based motion capture (Plask)
6:03 Finger-tracking gloves (Manus)
7:00 Conclusion

snippet.title: AI Show Live - Episode 63 - Deep Dive into Responsible AI Dashboard and Scorecard Description
snippet.description:
Minsoo Thigpen is back with a deep dive into the Responsible AI dashboard and scorecard explaining how to understand and assess their model insights in order to train and deploy their machine learning models more responsibly. She'll demo how to generate Responsible AI insights through CLI/SDK/UI in Azure Machine Learning and give us a tour of the RAI dashboard and scorecard.

üí° Resource links üí° 
What is RAI https://aka.ms/WhatIsRAI
Generate RAI https://aka.ms/GenerateRAI/preview
Zero to Hero Machine Learning on Azure 
https://aka.ms/ZerotoHero/MLonAzure
Zero to Hero Azure AI
https://aka.ms/ZerotoHero/AzureAI
Create a Free account (Azure) https://aka.ms/aishow-seth-azurefree 

Follow üëä ‚úã ‚úå
https://aka.ms/AIShow/RoshamboDiscussion
https://github.com/aiadvocates/roshambo
https://roshambo.ai

snippet.title: Selecting Solar - DTNS Experiment Week
snippet.description:
Solar enthusiast Brian Hoffman walks solar-curious Amos through the process, predicaments, and benefits of choosing solar, arming you with the right questions to ask when you decide solar is right for you.

Starring Brian Hoffman and Anthony Lemos

snippet.title: Made in Raccoon City - MLX team layoffs, Clipchamp Essentials plan, OneDrive turns 15
snippet.description:
MLX Team layoffs, Clipchamp Essentials plan, OneDrive turns 15
‚Ä¢ Microsoft lays off its Modern Life Experiences teams, has perhaps halted almost all hiring.¬†

Windows
‚Ä¢ New build (22621.382) for the Windows 11 Insider Preview Release Preview channel - 22H2 is still being refined. But there‚Äôs no blog post and the support page for this release 404s.
‚Ä¢ New builds for Dev and Beta channels, and Devs get an ISO
‚Ä¢ Windows Package Manager 1.3 arrives with support for portable apps
‚Ä¢ Clipchamp has a single paid tier now but it‚Äôs still too much.¬†
‚Ä¢ Microsoft is making its emoji library available on GitHub and Figma

Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Edge 104 arrives
‚Ä¢ DuckDuckGo to block Microsoft trackers after embarrassment¬†
‚Ä¢ OneDrive turns 15 and Microsoft is redesigning its home page

.NET/dev
‚Ä¢ Visual Studio 2022 17.3 arrives with MAUI support, plus several .NET milestone releases

Xbox
‚Ä¢ Microsoft is FINALLY testing an Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Family plan
‚Ä¢ Xbox Series S gets a memory boost
‚Ä¢ Microsoft is returning to Gamescom for some reason
‚Ä¢ A white Elite controller leaks and it is horrible
‚Ä¢ Unity picks Azure for its cloud developer tools
‚Ä¢ Nintendo has sold over 111 million Switch consoles

Tips and Picks
‚Ä¢ Tip of the week: Upgrading/Upgraded to Windows 11? You need to look at this OneDrive setting
‚Ä¢ App pick of the week: Parallels Desktop 18 for Mac
‚Ä¢ Enterprise pick of the week: Revisiting the M365-Office connectivity warning
‚Ä¢ Enterprise pick No. 2 of the week: Entra Verified ID now generally available
‚Ä¢ Beer pick of the week: Trillium Brewing Congress Street IPA

Hosts: Leo Laporte, Mary Jo Foley, and Paul Thurrott
Windows Weekly episode 789
More Info: https://twit.tv/shows/windows-weekly/episodes/789

Sponsors:
‚Ä¢ UnifyMeeting.com code WW
‚Ä¢ Secureworks.com/twit

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/windows-weekly

Get episodes ad-free with Club TWiT at https://twit.tv/clubtwit

Check out Paul's blog at thurrott.com

Check out Mary Jo's blog at AllAboutMicrosoft.com

The Windows Weekly theme music is courtesy of Carl Franklin.

TWiT.tv is a technology podcasting network located in the San Francisco Bay Area with the #1 ranked technology podcast This Week in Tech hosted by Leo Laporte. Every week we produce over 30 hours of content on a variety of programs including Tech News Weekly, MacBreak Weekly, This Week in Google, Windows Weekly, Security Now, All About Android, and more.

snippet.title: ML Security Operations at One of the Largest Brewing Companies ‚Ä¢ Maurits van der Goes ‚Ä¢ GOTO 2022
snippet.description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2022. #GOTOcon #GOTOams
http://gotoams.nl

Maurits van der Goes - Data Engineer at Heineken

ORIGINAL TALK TITLE
Machine Learning Security Operations at One of the World's Largest Brewing Companies

ABSTRACT
Data plays an increasingly important role in every industry, and that includes brewers. To foster its competitive position and expand into new markets, Heineken - a worldwide brewing leader for over 150 years - plans to leverage the vast amounts of data they collect. Machine Learning has thus become key for turning Big Data into actionable insights and data-driven improvements.
But how can this be scaled in a secure way? In this session, Maurits will discuss parallels between MLSecOps and DevSecOps, talk about a specific use case from Heineken and present how Heineken manages to automate security in the entire process.

You will learn more about:
‚Ä¢ Focus areas of Machine Learning Security Operations
‚Ä¢ The role of security in Machine Learning [...]

TIMECODES
00:00 Intro
04:42 Data democratization
05:20 MLOps: Machine learning operations
06:03 Machine learning operations life cycle
09:14 Shift-left security
09:56 What is MLSecOps?
14:39 Use case: Secure ML workbench
15:34 Use case: Insecure ML workbench
18:49 Quiz
19:55 Security importance
21:10 Sonatype Nexus
22:39 Use case: Secure ML workbench
23:50 Conclusion
24:42 Outro

Read the full abstract here:
https://gotoams.nl/2022/sessions/1983/machine-learning-security-operations-at-one-of-the-worlds-largest-brewing-companies

RECOMMENDED BOOKS
Liz Rice ‚Ä¢ Container Security ‚Ä¢ https://amzn.to/3oU4iJe
Liz Rice ‚Ä¢ Kubernetes Security ‚Ä¢ https://www.oreilly.com/library/view/kubernetes-security/9781492039075
Aaron Parecki ‚Ä¢ OAuth 2.0 Simplified ‚Ä¢ https://amzn.to/2A3IMOf
Aaron Parecki ‚Ä¢ OAuth 2.0 Servers ‚Ä¢ https://amzn.to/3ecHEsz
Aaron Parecki ‚Ä¢ The Little Book of OAuth 2.0 RFCs ‚Ä¢ https://amzn.to/3i7qnlC
Erdal Ozkaya ‚Ä¢ Cybersecurity: The Beginner's Guide ‚Ä¢ https://amzn.to/2T6OIj3
Jim Manico & August Detlefsen ‚Ä¢ Iron-Clad Java ‚Ä¢ https://amzn.to/3qGqwBw
Richer & Sanso ‚Ä¢ OAuth 2 in Action ‚Ä¢ https://amzn.to/3hXiAH6
Wilson & Hingnikar ‚Ä¢ Demystifying OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, and SAML 2.0 ‚Ä¢ https://amzn.to/2U8iLY2

https://twitter.com/GOTOcon
https://www.linkedin.com/company/goto-
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConferences
#MLSecOps #DevSecOps #ML #AI #ArtificialIntelligence #MachineLearning #Security #Cybersecurity #Heineken #DataScience #Programming #SoftwareEngineering #BigData #MLOps #Sonatype #Nexus #SonatypeNexus #Azure #NewRelic

snippet.title: Chorizo in Spaaaaaaaaace! - Amazon buys iRobot, Mofi vinyl controversy, Cybertruck cost increase
snippet.description:
Amazon buys iRobot, Mofi vinyl controversy, Cybertruck cost increase

‚Ä¢ Amazon's iRobot Deal Would Give It Maps Inside Millions of Homes.
